content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the `google` command to search for information on the Deer Glen nature reserve and the educational trail with six ecologically focused stations. The command returned several links to websites, including gotobrno.cz and parks.ny.gov. I attempted to open the gotobrno.cz link using the `execute_shell` command, but it returned an error stating that the shell command is not allowed.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "hiking trails near me"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.alltrails.com/", "https://www.traillink.com/activity/hiking-trails/", "https://www.timeout.com/chicago/things-to-do/the-best-places-for-hiking-near-chicago", "https://dayhikesneardenver.com/hikes-30-minutes-denver/", "https://www.timeout.com/newyork/things-to-do/the-best-hiking-near-nyc", "https://www.exploreasheville.com/outdoor-adventures/hiking/", "https://www.townandcountrymag.com/leisure/travel-guide/g33302691/best-hiking-near-nyc/", "https://www.atlantatrails.com/hiking-trails/atlantas-best-hiking-trails-our-top-10-favorite-hikes/"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.alltrails.com/", "question": "What are the best hiking trails near me?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: an advertisement for the AllTrails app, which provides information on hiking trails in various locations, including Brno and other regions in the Czech Republic. The app offers a variety of features, including verified trails, offline maps, and community reviews. It also promotes environmental conservation through partnerships with organizations like Leave No Trace and One Tree Planted.

The app offers features such as verified trails, offline maps, and wrong-turn alerts, and also promotes environmental initiatives such as Leave No Trace and One Tree Planted.

It offers features such as verified trails, offline maps, and wrong-turn alerts. The app also has a paid subscription service called AllTrails+ that offers additional planning features. The text does not provide information on how to install the AllTrails Python package.
